org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem

Class POIFSFileSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem.BlockStore
      • org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem.POIFSFileSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, POIFSViewable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TempFilePOIFSFileSystem 

    public class POIFSFileSystem
extends BlockStore
implements POIFSViewable, java.io.Closeable

    This is the main class of the POIFS system; it manages the entire life cycle of the filesystem.

    This is the new NIO version, which uses less memory

    (这是POIFS系统的主要类;它管理文件系统的整个生命周期。这是新的NIO版本，内存更少)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem.BlockStore

        BlockStore.ChainLoopDetector

    • Constructor Detail

      • POIFSFileSystem

        public POIFSFileSystem()
        Constructor, intended for writing(构造者，用于写作)

      • POIFSFileSystem

        public POIFSFileSystem(java.io.File file)
                throws java.io.IOException

        Creates a POIFSFileSystem from a File. This uses less memory than creating from an InputStream. The File will be opened read-only

        Note that with this constructor, you will need to call close() when you're done to have the underlying file closed, as the file is kept open during normal operation to read the data out.

        (从文件创建POIFSFileSystem。这比从InputStream创建使用更少的内存。文件将以只读方式打开请注意，使用此构造函数，当您关闭基础文件时，您需要调用close（），因为该文件在正常操作期间保持打开状态以读取数据。)
        Parameters:
        file - the File from which to read the data(文件-读取数据的文件)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on errors reading, or on invalid data(java.io. IOResponse-读取错误或数据无效)

      • POIFSFileSystem

        public POIFSFileSystem(java.io.File file,
                       boolean readOnly)
                throws java.io.IOException

        Creates a POIFSFileSystem from a File. This uses less memory than creating from an InputStream.

        Note that with this constructor, you will need to call close() when you're done to have the underlying file closed, as the file is kept open during normal operation to read the data out.

        (从文件创建POIFSFileSystem。这比从InputStream创建使用更少的内存。请注意，对于此构造函数，当您关闭基础文件时，您需要调用close（），因为该文件在正常操作期间保持打开状态以读取数据。)
        Parameters:
        file - the File from which to read or read/write the data(文件-读取或读/写数据的文件)
        readOnly - whether the POIFileSystem will only be used in read-only mode(readOnly-POIFileSystem是否仅在只读模式下使用)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on errors reading, or on invalid data(java.io. IOResponse-读取错误或数据无效)

      • POIFSFileSystem

        public POIFSFileSystem(java.nio.channels.FileChannel channel)
                throws java.io.IOException

        Creates a POIFSFileSystem from an open FileChannel. This uses less memory than creating from an InputStream. The stream will be used in read-only mode.

        Note that with this constructor, you will need to call close() when you're done to have the underlying Channel closed, as the channel is kept open during normal operation to read the data out.

        (从打开的文件通道创建POIFSFileSystem。这比从InputStream创建使用更少的内存。该流将以只读模式使用。请注意，对于此构造函数，当您完成关闭基础通道时，您需要调用close（），因为通道在正常操作期间保持打开以读取数据。)
        Parameters:
        channel - the FileChannel from which to read the data(channel -从中读取数据的FileChannel)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on errors reading, or on invalid data(java.io. IOResponse-读取错误或数据无效)

      • POIFSFileSystem

        public POIFSFileSystem(java.nio.channels.FileChannel channel,
                       boolean readOnly)
                throws java.io.IOException

        Creates a POIFSFileSystem from an open FileChannel. This uses less memory than creating from an InputStream.

        Note that with this constructor, you will need to call close() when you're done to have the underlying Channel closed, as the channel is kept open during normal operation to read the data out.

        (从打开的文件通道创建POIFSFileSystem。这比从InputStream创建使用更少的内存。请注意，对于此构造函数，当您完成关闭基础通道时，您需要调用close（），因为通道在正常操作期间保持打开以读取数据。)
        Parameters:
        channel - the FileChannel from which to read or read/write the data(通道-读取或读/写数据的文件通道)
        readOnly - whether the POIFileSystem will only be used in read-only mode(readOnly-POIFileSystem是否仅在只读模式下使用)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on errors reading, or on invalid data(java.io. IOResponse-读取错误或数据无效)

      • POIFSFileSystem

        public POIFSFileSystem(java.io.InputStream stream)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Create a POIFSFileSystem from an InputStream. Normally the stream is read until EOF. The stream is always closed.

        Some streams are usable after reaching EOF (typically those that return true for markSupported()). In the unlikely case that the caller has such a stream and needs to use it after this constructor completes, a work around is to wrap the stream in order to trap the close() call. A convenience method ( createNonClosingInputStream()) has been provided for this purpose:

         InputStream wrappedStream = POIFSFileSystem.createNonClosingInputStream(is);
 HSSFWorkbook wb = new HSSFWorkbook(wrappedStream);
 is.reset();
 doSomethingElse(is);
        Note also the special case of ByteArrayInputStream for which the close() method does nothing. 
         ByteArrayInputStream bais = ...
 HSSFWorkbook wb = new HSSFWorkbook(bais); // calls bais.close() !
 bais.reset(); // no problem
 doSomethingElse(bais);
        (从InputStream创建POIFSFileSystem。通常情况下，流会被读取直到中断。溪流总是关闭的。某些流在达到RST后即可使用（通常是那些对于markSupport（）返回true的流）。在调用者有这样一个流并且需要在构造函数完成后使用它的情况下（这种情况不太可能发生），一种解决方法是包装流以捕获close（）调用。为此目的提供了一个方便的方法（NonClosingInputStream（））：InputStream wrappedStream = POIFSFileSystem. NonClosingInputStream（is）; HSSFWorkbook String = new HSSFWorkbook（wrappedStream）; sort（）; doSomethingElse（is）; 另请注意ByteArrayInputStream的特殊情况，close（）方法对此不做任何事情。 字节数组输入Stream bais =. HSSFWorkbook =新HSSFWorkbook（bais）; //调用bais.close（）！ bais.reset（）; //没问题 doSomethingElse（bais）;)
        Parameters:
        stream - the InputStream from which to read the data(stream -从中读取数据的InputStream)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on errors reading, or on invalid data(java.io. IOResponse-读取错误或数据无效)

      • getFreeBlock

        protected int getFreeBlock()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Finds a free block, and returns its offset. This method will extend the file if needed, and if doing so, allocate new FAT blocks to address the extra space.(查找空闲块，并返回其补偿。如果需要，此方法将扩展文件，如果这样做，请分配新的脂肪块来解决额外的空间。)
        Specified by:
        getFreeBlock in class BlockStore(BlockStore类中的getFreeBlock)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException(java.io.IOException)

      • isInPlaceWriteable

        public boolean isInPlaceWriteable()
        Does the filesystem support an in-place write via writeFilesystem() ? If false, only writing out to a brand new file via writeFilesystem(OutputStream) is supported.(文件系统是否支持通过writeFilesHandler（）进行就地写入？如果为假，则仅支持通过writeFilesHandler（OutputStream）写入全新文件。)

        public void writeFilesystem()
                     throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown on errors writing to the stream(java.io. IOResponse-写入流时发生错误时引发)

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the FileSystem, freeing any underlying files, streams and buffers. After this, you will be unable to read or write from the FileSystem.(关闭文件系统，释放任何底层文件、流和缓冲区。此后，您将无法从文件系统读取或写入。)
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable(在界面中关闭java.io.Closeable)
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable(在界面中关闭java.lang.AutoCloseable)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException(java.io.IOException)

      • create

        public static POIFSFileSystem create(java.io.File file)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new POIFSFileSystem in a new File. Use POIFSFileSystem(File) to open an existing File, this should only be used to create a new empty filesystem.(在新文件中创建新的POIFSFileSystem。使用POIFSFileSystem（文件）打开现有文件，这应仅用于创建新的空文件系统。)
        Parameters:
        file - The file to create and open(文件-要创建和打开的文件)
        Returns:
        The created and opened POIFSFileSystem(创建并打开的POIFSFilesSystem)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException(java.io.IOException)

        Releases a mmap-ed buffer, which you are sure won't be used again(释放mmap编辑的缓冲区，您确定该缓冲区不会再次使用)
        Specified by:
        releaseBuffer in class BlockStore(BlockStore类中的releaseBuffer)
        Parameters:
